meanings.definition: A Korean dish made of fermented vegetables, typically cabbage and radishes, seasoned with garlic, ginger, and chili peppers.
meanings.sent1: I tried kimchee for the first time at the Korean restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious kimchee at home.
meanings.sent3: The kimchee in the fridge started dancing when I opened the door.
meanings.sent4: The spicy kimchee added a burst of flavor to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The pungent smell of kimchee filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: Let's kimchee together for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: I kimcheed the vegetables with care to make the dish perfect.
meanings.sent3: He kimchees so fast that his friends can't keep up.
meanings.sent4: She kimchees her kimchee like an artist creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Kimcheeing the spicy dish made her mouth water in anticipation.
